ValidationRule.description: When Referrer Email or First Name or Last Name is entered, the other two fields must be entered.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT($Setup.Americord_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rule__c), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled"), NOT(ISBLANK(Referred_by_email_address__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Referred_by_First_Name__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK( Referred_by_Last_Name__c)), ISBLANK (Referred_by_First_Name__c) || ISBLANK (Referred_by_Last_Name__c) || ISBLANK (Referred_by_email_address__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Referrer First Name, Last Name and Email Address are required.
